subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: R. W. Eaks shot an nine-under 63 for a three-stroke lead over Gene Jones and Loren Roberts after the second round of the Champions Tour’s 3M Championship in Blaine, Minn. The first-round leader, Dana Quiqley, is four shots back at 12 under. Bernhard Langer is at 11 under.
snippet: R. W. Eaks shot an nine-under 63 for a three-stroke lead over Gene Jones and Loren Roberts after the second round of the Champions Tour’s 3M Championship in Blaine, Minn. The first-round leader, Dana Quiqley, is four shots back at 12 under....
